model

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Inventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Joey This is the inventory class that will contain all the items to be displayed for the user to purchase. The inventory implements cloneable and serializable (using a variant of the decorator pattern called stream decarators). The inventory also acts as the model in the MVC pattern when the inventory is displayed by the GUI.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
